page.title: 03FARMING (CONT)
page.content: Very few bulls are kept. Some farmers do artificial insemination others have visiting inseminators. Grassland is in premanent pasture or short term leys. Conserved as silage or hay. Barley is grown, tower stored for cattle feeding. Hedges are of hawthorn and or beech. The fences are posts and wire. Land is varies, light, medium and heavy loams. There are benefits from the effect of the Gulf Stream, snow seldom lies. 1985 has been the worst summer on record, with a devestating effect on crop conservation and stock management. Doom indeed. Tractors and tractor mounted machinery used is for ploughing, cultivating, haymaking, silage making. Combine harvesters for grain crop. A hedge cutting machine is used for hedges, slurry and manure spreaders for dung.
